alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 13 at 3:09PM PST until February 13 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Between 4 PM and 10 PM, an additional 5 to 8 inches of snow accumulation. * WHERE...Holden Village and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions at Stevens Pass on US-2.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
